title: Types of wiring systems
fullText:
Cables shall be of stranded construction and shall be suitably insulated and/or sheathed for the applicable installation.
Cable insulation and or sheathing may be compromised by a chemical reaction if it is in contact with polystyrene and polyurethane.
Cables shall be installed so there is no direct contact between the cable and polystyrene and/or polyurethane.
Exception: A cable that is manufactured and identified as being suitable for installation in contact with polystyrene and polyurethane is permissible.
